post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
We need 3 guys. The brief requirements are as follows:

Win 98 2-3 years. Visual Basic, VB Script, Oracle (DB2 is O.K.),
Minimum 5-10 year IT experience.
Preferrably, experience on Data Transfer on Hand Held Devices.
Starting Date is in the beginning of April.
Work Place is in Pickering.
These are 6 month contract positions with a very good rate.

Please send me an e-mail with a resume, at the above address by 19th of March.

Thanks.

Don.
post.title: [2001/3/14] Need VB programmers with 5~10 IT exp. (작성자: Don)
